text: Wolthausen is a village (Ortsteil) in the municipality of Winsen (Aller) in Celle in the north German state of Lower Saxony. It is on the River Ã–rtze in the Aller valley and on the B 3 federal road. == Other websites == * Official website of Winsen (Aller) Category:Villages in Lower Saxony Category:Winsen an der Aller
